2.11. System Module – Loaded kernel modules¶

The list of system modules is accessible via windows.system.modules

Note

See sample windows.system

2.11.1. SystemModule¶

class windows.winobject.system_module.SystemModule[source]¶

Bases: windows.winobject.system_module.BaseSystemModule, windows.generated_def.winstructs._SYSTEM_MODULE32

A system module.

Note

inherit from SYSTEM_MODULE[32/64] based on the current process bitness
